Poker has
gone through many exciting developments throughout the past few years. 
More and more people have been getting
interested in the game; these players generally understand more about poker and
about the importance of not being too
predictable.
With
hands like pair of aces, kings or queens, it’s easy to become readable and
under these situations, the other players can easily guess what you are dealing
with.
Don’t
play in such a stereotypical way!
You could have an 8-10 pair in your hand, and reach a big monster like ace-king! In this case, not only can the
pre-flop be decisive, but the board as well.
Our
advice is not to be too selective with
your opening hand, trying to hit more: your advantage is to be unpredictable. 
Is it
better to emphasize more on the flop or on the opening hand? And how should you
adapt to the post-flop strategy? 
It always
pays to be aggressive on the
pre-flop! Sometimes you have to face opponents playing quite bad in post-flop,
and in this case, you can use the
situation to your advantage. Put maximum pressure on them, and make them
ask themselves lots of questions, get them to pay in order to discover if you are bluffing or not.
This is
the very essence of Poker, mainly of
no-Limit: making your opponents
play, not the cards!
Good
cards are not there to wait for you all the time: you have to seize your
opportunity the moment you feel that your
opponent can be easily defeated.

new winning strategy, and check out other online gaming tips at the Titan Poker website.
